query:
select 'Query' as type, q.name from qymschedule qs
inner join qymquery q on q.id = qymquery_id
left join admuser u on u.id = qs.admuser_id
where emailaddresses like '%:email:%' or email like '%:email:%'
union all
select 'BridgeQuery' as type, b.name from bymschedule bs
inner join bymquery b on b.id = bymquery_id
left join admuser u on u.id = bs.admuser_id
where emailaddresses like '%:email:%' or email like '%:email:%'
name: GTI - schedules sent to user
description: List controls sent to user filled in parameter
